name: External  outbonding links
author: Ganesh Paygude

sections.description:
External outbonding links to add rel=”nofollow” target=”_blank” attributes to External links in page and post content.

Major features in External outbonding links include:

  • Setting option checkbox allow to apply the attributes to link.
  • External links opens in new tab.

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

short_description: Allow to add the rel="nofollow" and target="_blank" for external links which helps for SEO.
